hints.content: Let's use the place value blocks on the chart to help us solve.

We can put our two numbers together on the place value chart.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/55b369018287178cf328dc7e171d7aed679600d8)

Now, there are $5\text{ hundreds}, 2\text{ tens}$ and $13\text{ ones}$.

We can take our $13\text{ ones}$ and make $1\text{ ten}$ and $3\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/bbef981a2bb969928000e086ad5fed38d8a78689)

In all, there are $5\text{ hundreds}, 3\text{ tens}$ and $3\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/204706f83645b904e14786216b8cddde696bede1)

$500 + 30 + 3 = 533$

question.content:
